**Target Issue URL**
Please provide the link to the GitHub Issue where DevSeer failed or behaved unexpectedly.
*Example: https://github.com/my-org/my-repo/issues/123*

**Describe the Bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. Did the bot not reply? Did it give a hallucinated estimation? Did it miss a dependency?

**Expected Behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Additional Context**
Add any other context about the problem here. 

> **Privacy Note:** Please do not paste sensitive private code snippets directly into this public issue. If the bug relates to a specific private repository structure, please describe it generically.
